messages.content:
Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vlogic_low = vlogic_high; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vlogic_high = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin2) - vtrans, 1))  b = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin2) - vtrans, 1)) b = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_borrow_val = !a || b ? vlogic_high : vlogic_low; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
output vin1, vin2; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
output vout_diff; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vtrans = 6.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_borrow_val = !a && b ? vlogic_low : vlogic_high; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_diff_val = a && b ? vlogic_high : vlogic_low; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   initial begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
   analog begin

 Correction Criteria：Changed 'analog begin' to 'initial begin', converting the continuous analog block to a one-time digital initial block. This prevents continuous evaluation of cross events and output transitions, freezing outputs after t=0 and breaking the dynamic subtraction functionality.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
b = V(vin1) > vtrans; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
V(vout_borrow) <+ transition( vlogic_low, tdel, trise, tfall); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin2) - vtrans, 1))  b = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    vtrans = vlogic_low; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
electrical vin1, vin2, vout_diff; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = -1u from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin1) - vtrans, 1))  a = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
V(vout_diff) <+ transition( vout_borrow_val, tdel, trise, tfall); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
b = V(vin1) > vtrans; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
moduel half_subtractor(vin1, vin2, vout_diff, vout_borrow); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real trise = 1u from (0:inf] Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   b = V(vin2) > vtrans Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real trise = 1u from (0:inf; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   real vout_diff_val Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_diff_val = a ^ b ? vlogic_high : vlogic_low Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   real vout_diff_val Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   integer a, b Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real trise = 1u from (0:inf; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
      V(vout_diff) <+ transition( vout_diff_val tdel, trise, tfall); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_borrow_val = !a && b ? vlogic_high : vlogic_low Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from (0:inf; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
moduel half_subtractor(vin1, vin2, vout_diff, vout_borrow); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
      V(vout_borrow) <+ transition( vout_borrow_val, tdel, trise, tfall; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from (0;inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vtrans = 1.4 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:

output vout_diff vout_borrow; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

parameter real vtrans 1.4; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.
